g.text: . Improvements to NOAA’s Historical Merged Land–Ocean Surface Temperature analysis (1880–2006).
. NOAA’s Merged Land–Ocean Surface Temperature Analysis.
53. UCAR/NCAR/CISL/TDD. The NCAR Command Language (NCL), Version 6.3.0, https://doi.org/10.5065/D6WD3XH5 (2015).
NCAR is sponsored by the National Science Foundation. A.G.P., R.K., and B.S. were supported by the Regional
and Global Climate Modeling Program of the U.S. Department of Energy’s Office of Science, Cooperative
Agreement DE-FC02-97ER62402. We thank Jerry Meehl for feedback on the manuscript.
A.G.P. designed the study, analyzed the data, produced the figures and led the writing. R.K., F.L., C.D., and B.M.S.
provided advice in the study design and the interpretation of the results and contributed to the writing.
The authors declare that they have no competing interests.
